"Abandoning Quests": "If you want to abandon a Quest in progress, open the Main Menu with <swguidetype T_MainMenu>, select <yellow>\"Tasks/Quest\"<c>, then select <yellow>\"Quest Information\"<c>, then <yellow>\"Abandon Quest\"<c>."

"When you abandon a Quest, the Quest ends immediately and you are returned to the place where you accepted it.

You receive no rewards for an abandoned Quest. All party members automatically abandon the Quest at the same time as you do."
